sense.def:
Z izrazom
last
opišemo najbližje obdobje, dogodek ali stvar.

seg.quote: I went to a party last night.
...the last four years.
Thanks for your last letter.

sense.def:
Stvar ali del, ki je
the last
, pride na koncu.

seg.quote: He missed the last bus.
...the last classroom along that passage.
Hooper was the last to leave.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
last
tudi govorimo o edini stvari ali delu, ki ostane.

seg.quote: She removed the last traces of make-up.
Otto drank the last of the brandy.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
last
poudarimo, da nečesa nočemo storiti ali se nekaj najverjetneje ne bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: The last thing I want to do is offend you.
I would be the last to suggest that.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
last happened on a particular occasion
, se od določene priložnosti ni več zgodilo.

seg.quote: They last saw their homeland nine years ago.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
last
, se zgodi za vsem drugim.

seg.quote: He added the milk last.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
lasts
, obstaja ali se dogaja še naprej.

seg.quote: His speech lasted for exactly fourteen minutes.
Profits are as high as ever. It won't last.

sense.def:
To last
pomeni tudi ostati v dobrem stanju.

seg.quote: A fresh pepper lasts about three weeks.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
Kadar določena količina nečesa
lasts for a period of time
, je je dovolj, da jo nekdo uporablja določeno obdobje.

seg.quote: A cheap box of toothpowder lasts two years.
He had only £8 left to last him till he reached Bury.

sense.def:
Kadar se je nekaj zgodilo
at last
ali
at long last
, se je zgodilo po dolgem obdobju.

seg.quote: At last Ralph stopped work and stood up.
At long last I've found a girl that really loves me.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
the last
povemo, da se nekaj ni zgodilo ali da ni spet obstajalo po določenem času ali da se ne bo nikoli več znova zgodilo ali obstajalo.

seg.quote: That was the last I ever saw of Northcliffe.

sense.def:
Z izrazi, kot sta
to the last detail
ali
to the last man
poudarimo, da vključujemo vse stvari ali osebe do zadnje.

seg.quote: The robbery was planned down to the last detail.
